lead_paragraph: Brazilian federal police are investigating local sports federations for allegedly embezzling funds meant for training Olympic athletes, Globo TV said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Police Investigate Federations for Allegedly Embezzling Olympic Investments-TV
headline.main: Brazil Police Investigate Federations for Allegedly Embezzling Olympic Investments-TV
